We considered this was a wonderful providence, the conversion of these young men. We recognized the hand of God in the matter and dared not close the door against this young man, and we have taken him under our guardianship. He will, when of age, receive his legacy and then will return the money loaned. Some say he can come into possession at seventeen, others 


                                    -88- 

say at twenty-one. W. C. White went on Friday to do up the business for the young man, and secure his tickets.
